definitions.definition: A substance that does not transmit heat ( thermal insulator ), sound ( acoustic insulator ) or electricity ( electrical insulator ).
A non - conductive structure , coating or device that does not transmit sound, heat or electricity (see image)
examples: To isolate electrical wires from the pylons supporting them, one often uses glass insulators .

main_definition: A substance that does not transmit heat ( thermal insulator ), sound ( acoustic insulator ) or electricity ( electrical insulator ).
secondary_definitions: A non - conductive structure , coating or device that does not transmit sound, heat or electricity (see image)
